Posts.EditableText: I recently did a few minor corrections on my game 'Shoddy and Pigears' . When I looked at the amended game, the cover art had flipped upside down. I had done nothing to alter it. It was a photo I had taken myself on the same IPad. I have had this happen before.  I had therefore taken  two shots of the cover , one upside down and picked the one that worked.  The picture was definitely right way before I amended the game. ( mainly punctuation errors and typos. Puzzling.

Not sure why it would be upside down...

The text and image that go on the web site are taken from your game the first time it uploads, but not when you update your game. There are options via the web site to do separately.
